data.eml:eml: The genital area of Halacaridae (Acari), life stages and development of morphological characters and implication on the classification

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bartsch, Ilse (2015): The genital area of Halacaridae (Acari), life stages and development of morphological characters and implication on the classification. Zootaxa 3919 (2): 201-259, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3919.2.1
